__e: I'm speaking to you today as a wife, a mother, a servant of the people, and as your Queen.

Shame on me for worrying about my own safety even though I am a servant of God. But you, a half-human, half-Yoma, a damned slayer who is forbidden to step foot in this city, are worried about the boy you brought more than your own life.
Well, you couldn't be with him when he was a kitchen servant and you were a queen's lady.
"For first, last, and always I am a servant of the people.
Last I checked, she could only be ganked by a servant of heaven.
Okay! Why was the servant of love in our building?
